subject: fix: add validation to save-commit.js to prevent incomplete saves
body:
Root cause of malformed commits: when AI analyzed batches, it only
output analysis fields instead of complete commit objects. Without
validation, these incomplete commits were saved to processed/.

Now save-commit.js validates:
- Required metadata: sha, timestamp, subject
- Required author: author_id or author
- Required analysis: tags, complexity, urgency, impact

Fails fast with clear error message if any fields are missing.
